field.name: summary
field.value: ActiveRecordFacility doesn't obey namingstrategytype configuration attribute.

field.name: description
field.value:
ConfigurationSourceAdapter doesn't set the NamingStrategyType in the configuration adapter that is passed on into ActiveRecordStarter.Initialize(), therefor not obeying the preferred namingstrategy.
Didn't modify any tests because I'm not sure what needs to be changed and this is a very minor change aswell.
Please bare with my lack of experience submitting patches, I hope this atleast will save some time for someone.
